DMMO3.SA.summary: Dommo Energia S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas in Brazil. The company's properties include BM-C-39, BM-C-40, and BM-C-41 located in the Campos basin. It also owns an interest in the BS-4 block located in the Santos basin. PRIO3.SA.summary: Petro Rio S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties in Brazil and internationally. The company holds interests in the Polvo Field covering an area of 134 square kilometres located in the southern portion of the Campos Basin, Rio de Janeiro; Manati Field totaling an area of 76 kilometres located in the Camumu Basin, on the coast of the State of Bahia; and Frade Field covering an area of 154 kilometres located in the northern region of the Campos Basin, Rio de Janeiro. It imports, exports, refines, sales, and distributes oil, natural gas, fuels, and oil by-products; and generates, sells, and distributes electric power. The company was formerly known as HRT ParticipaÃ§Ãµes em PetrÃ³leo S.A. and changed its name to Petro Rio S.A. in June 2015. Petro Rio S.A. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Botafogo, Brazil.
